person.persName: John J. Averitt (Marion County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Isaacs Averitt. Father of William F. Averitt, Macy J. Averitt, and Bud N. Averitt. Student in Marion County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Farmer in Marion County in 1860. Farmer in Marion County in 1863.
